meanings.definition: A standard layout for English-language typewriter and computer keyboards.
meanings.sent1: I prefer typing on a qwertys keyboard because it's familiar to me.
meanings.sent2: She learned touch typing on a qwertys keyboard in school.
meanings.sent3: The qwertys keyboard layout makes typing so much easier!
meanings.sent4: In the world of keyboards, the qwertys layout reigns supreme.
meanings.sent5: The qwertys layout is like a well-orchestrated symphony of letters and keys.

meanings.definition: A person who uses the QWERTY keyboard layout.
meanings.sent1: As a qwertys, he can type really fast without looking at the keys.
meanings.sent2: The office manager hired a new qwertys to handle data entry tasks.
meanings.sent3: The skilled qwertys effortlessly typed away, impressing everyone around.
meanings.sent4: She was a true qwertys, mastering the art of typing with precision.
meanings.sent5: The qwertys was like a keyboard wizard, casting spells with every keystroke.

meanings.definition: The arrangement of keys on a QWERTY keyboard.
meanings.sent1: The qwertys of the keyboard layout allows for efficient typing.
meanings.sent2: He studied the qwertys of the keyboard to understand its design better.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked across the qwertys of the keyboard, causing chaos on the screen.
meanings.sent4: The qwertys of the keyboard resembled a maze of letters waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: Her fingers danced across the qwertys of the keyboard, creating a beautiful melody of words.
